title: Portuguese in southern China and technology

content.question: The Portuguese presence in southern China as described in the passage was most directly enabled by which of the following?

choices.label: The declining role of Muslim and Jewish merchants in transporting goods within Asia
Technological developments in cartography and navigation
The creation of laissez-faire state policies

content.answer: Technological developments in cartography and navigation

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
